entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • string.Join with first element null status #86823
  • [browser][wasm-mt] Regression with asset loading, improper URL resolution for WebWorker file #86819
  • Add trace events to scenarios where a certificate is loaded and used by an application to monitor for expiration #86814
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonEncoder (rather than JavaScriptEncoder) #86810
  • Provide a runtime package through the store #86808
  • Default JSON escaping is biased against other languages #86805
  • Host Feature request: Enable FDD apps to always get the globally installed runtime #86801
  • Read/Write Big/LittleEndian support for Guid #86798
    8.0.0
  • running windows code in net6 target project #86797
  • [API Proposal]: Expose Version on List<T> and similar Enumerables #86795
  • [wasm][hybridglobalization] ToUpper/ToLower does not work correctly when the length of character changes #86794
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator should generate code using "global::" #86786
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: InstrumentRecorder - notification of new measurements #86783
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Support for adding default tags to specific meter and/or instruments #84321
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Figure out how we should handle the disposing of the meters created from meter factory #86592
    8.0.0
  • [Tracking] Decide if the tags order matter when creating meter or instrument #86614
    8.0.0
  • DefaultMeterFactory.Create and MeterOptions.Scope #86684
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Uuid data type #86084
  • JIT: Physical promotion readback mechanism does not take implicit control flow into account #86498
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Utf8Formatter #84989
  • Blazor Wasm: debugging broken by attribute with type parameter #86765
    8.0.0
  • Cmdline arguments are not parsed correctly using System.Environment.CommandLine #84723
  • [Analyzer suggestion]: Avoid recursive iterators #85015
  • Provide Minimal JSON Escaping Implementation #86800
    Future
  • Vector256.Shuffle() returns incorrect result when index is out of bounds #85132
  • Inconsistent comments on `Convert.ChangeType` #85299
  • Topological Sort in S.T.J source generator not correct #86702
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.5.23264.1] Apps that using BinaryFormatter will get System.NotSupportedException Exception #86308
  • System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames missing types #1489
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add more entries to MediaTypeNames #85807
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.ToBoolean supports "1" and "0" values #86579
  • `double.Parse` with `NumberStyles.Currency` Fails to Parse Strings with Non-Breaking Spaces #86641
  • [NativeAOT] How to export functions for executables? #86788
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\Activator\\Activator #86569
    8.0.0
  • Compiled regex timeout skewed on first evaluation #54747
    Future
  • Arm64: Generate conditional comparison and selection instructions #55364
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix recursive type support when consuming source generated code from the .NET 6 sdk. #86821
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • unroll byref struct copies #86820
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2189240 #86818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change the LockCreated event to ContentionLockCreated #86817
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Unify trim warnings for accessing compiler generated code #86816
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [mono][debugger] Support new JMC #86815
    area-Debugger-mono
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update to use the cbl-mariner webassembly images. #86806
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update to the 22.04 debpkg image so we're on a newer ubuntu version. #86803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • POH allocation fix #86802
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` fix bug in change case #86799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Optimize Load Immediate #86790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add NativeAOT build and runtime pack for linux-bionic #86781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #85692
    area-Infrastructure
  • Address Metrics APIs issues #86740
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 8.0.0
  • Dump data in proc test #86784
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Add support for types with parameterized ctors to config binder gen #86365
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Change our Android build and test legs to use the new CBL-Mariner-based images. #86776
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix StringMarshalling error message and actually copy attributes from methods to shadows #86731
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Pick some low-hanging fruit in physical promotion throughput #86792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Have physical promotion insert read backs before possible implicit control flow #86706
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Allow RBO for known relops even without a dominator #86774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Guarded devirtualization: multiple type checks #86551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NativeAot with latest ILLink changes #86712
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Remove cast bug #86789
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove inconsistent comments in Convert.cs #86425
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add adjacency row length check in System.Text.Json Topological Sort #86716
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • update MediaTypeNames #86770
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [7.0] Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest in mobile #86708
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix ISA outerloop tests #86705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Exclude unused bundle files in AppleAppBuilder #86316
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Expand CORINFO_HELP_CHKCASTANY cast #86728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add build-runtime-tests make target #86785
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2188652 #86779
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Re-enable ~6700 runtime tests that got disabled mistakenly #86747
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run sdk tests on wasm PRs #86744
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable mark list optimization if we hit a per region mark list overflow #86508
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Eliminate cancellation deadlock in RateLimiter implementations #85523
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Up Minimum CMake Version to 3.20 #86530
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf: Use `test-main.js` instead of `test-main-7.0.js` #86742
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • [NativeAOT] A few changes to make stack walks a bit faster #86690
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Update memory views after growth, refactor string processing, fix SharedArrayBuffer detection #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix branch #86482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add timestamps to XUnitLogChecker output #86737
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: expand qmarks earlier #86778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Read public GC options if available #86068
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Attempt to fix unfailing helix test run when testResults.xml are missing #86342
    area-Infrastructure
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label, os-haiku
  • Implement resource lookup in satellite assemblies #86689
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][tests] Run Mono iOS sample on Helix #86578
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Improving HelloiOS sample for NativeAOT to be testable with runtime packs #86652
    NO-MERGE, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Add support for deferred failures during AOT compilation #86554
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • The AllocationTick threshold is computed by a Poisson process with a 100 KB mean. #85750
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Green Threads] - Integration into Task.Wait is probably wrong in various ways. #2016

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a few issues #2289
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Change hash key to use edgePredBlock #2290

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • Add Support for explicitly including Dependencies in build output in PackageReference #32863

Closed

  • Unable to link a .EditorConfig via Build Props. Missing documentation? #32837
  • "dotnet tool run <COMMAND_NAME> [<toolArguments>...] [options]" #32861
  • `dotnet publish` updates `project.deps.json` for a project with a `PackageReference` with `PrivateAssets="All"` even when nothing has changed #28661
  • SourceLink: Repository instance not found in cache #32714

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Back up to latest 17.7 build for p5 #32826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2189024 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It looks like `ReturnsVoidIsSetBit` flag used in SourceMemberMethodSymbol.Flags is meaningless #68344
  • GetTypeByMetadataName would benefit greatly from non-alloc optimizations. #68343
  • Sticky Scroll still thinks it is in try block #68340
  • HotReload crashes with "An item with the same key has already been added" #68335

Closed

  • SemanticModel.GetDeclaredSymbol(node) returns null for ParameterListSyntax of a primary constructor #68341
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unexpected value 'PropertyAccess' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.BoundKind' #68194

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement extension member lookup (non-generic) #68342
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Implement definite assignment and region analysis for inline array types #68339
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Use DelayTimeSpan where applicable #68338
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix completions after `unsafe` in using directive #68334
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Optimize WeakEvent<T> on .NET 6 and greater #68332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Don't check member name conflicts on explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Use 'nameof' with LocalizedName attribute #68337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Language-VB, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, Next
  • Drop source suppressed diagnostics in LSP pull diagnostic handler #68333
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure that we always run all diagnostic suppressors for single file analysis #68270
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Expect mapped paths in InterceptsLocationAttribute #68242
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support 'foreach' for inline arrays. #68297
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Switch to primary constructors in IDE layer #68299
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48461
  • @Html.AntiForgeryToken() invalidating previous tokens #48458
  • Detecting IIS 503s caused by multiple host instances #48457
  • .NET 6 Web API Project required Web.Config to work in Azure App Service (Windows) #48456
  • sourcelink dependency is out of date #48455
  • [Blazor] CascadingModelBinder rework. #48454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Very odd bug in blazor wasm when calling a js browser extension #48453
  • Change the file extension of .razor to .raz #48452
  • [Blazor] Handle cascading values coming from multiple sources #48451
    8.0-preview6
  • Way to programmatically parse .razor (blazor) files and get an object model #48449
  • Component inheritance seems to be broken #48447
  • CSS variabels not recognized through Style boundle linking #48463
  • [Blazor] Introduce `[QueryParameter]` and `[FormParameter]` #48443
  • Startup assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.AzureAppServices.HostingStartup failed to execute in Azure App service. #48442
  • IDX20803: Unable to obtain configuration from: 'System.String'. #48441
  • [Blazor] Obsolete AddServerSideBlazor #48440
  • ASP.NET Core Webhooks #48438
    Discussions
  • When I set builder.Logging.ClearProviders();, dotnet run stuck in building #48437
  • Improve side-by-side configuration of HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 endpoints #48436

Closed

  • Project option not working correctly for the `user-jwts` command #46218
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Calling `dotnet user-jwts` while app is running causes malformed appsettings #44869
    .NET 8 Planning
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template not correctly populating Identity Options. #47447
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove Duende from SPA and Blazor WASM project templates #47226
    8.0-preview5
  • Make RequestImageFileAsync customizable (or allow us to change BrowserFile data) #47743
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • [Blazor] Cache LayoutAttribute lookup #48439
    area-blazor

Merged

  • fix exception handler unit test #48459
    area-runtime, diagnostics, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts, 8.0-preview6
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove IdentityServer from spa-templates #48430
    area-identity, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cb455a7` to `4580469` #48446
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `3881d5a` to `45228c8` #48445
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2189042 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell TabBar - OnClicked event or other way to detect click on currently active tab #15301
  • In the maui blazorWebView development, in order to display images provided by external websites, Content-Security-Policy is used, and data: http: https: has been specified, as follows: #15299
  • Windows Titlebar where Close-Max-Min buttons rendered are different from where they are clickable #15297
  • NavigationPage BackButtonPressed sent ignores Android OnBackPressed #15296
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException when I try to start a ForegroundService #15292
  • TextToSpeech rate and current reading index #15290
  • ScrollView inside a dynamic Grid row won't completely scroll (iOS) #15288
  • .Net 8P4 WPF/Maiu can't load Blazor Router #15287

Closed

  • Maui xaml x:static can not get value from base class? #15285
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #13798
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebAuthenticator crash with some browsers #13302
    Backlog
  • OnPageAppearing firing before the OnNavigatedTo event for a page #15256
  • Can't use certificate by trusted source while publishing maui blazor app #7961
  • Exception Throw when Trimming Mode is Enable #8631

PullRequests

Created

  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 Preview 5 #15302
  • [net7.0] Set DOTNET_gcServer #15300

Merged

  • Enable parallel builds back #15298
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set DOTNET_gcServer #15275
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Android WebAuth callback for system browser flows #15187
    area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • Update cake scripts #15277
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.AppCompat.AppCompatResources from 1.6.1.1 to 1.6.1.2 #15263
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Crypto.Tink.Android from 1.9.0 to 1.9.0.1 #15270
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.0.2 #15272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net7.0] Set Version for Windows #15240
  • Improved WebUtils.ParseQueryString() #15245
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix issue with CollectionView ignoring margins for content #15246
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use [AppendTo|PrependTo|Replace]Mapping for Focus commands #15040
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [net8.] Merge main #15186
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15235
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MsgPack for Json Serialization #30980
  • Database.SqlQuery<bool> does not work #30979
  • Configuration File Support for `dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold` Command #30978
  • How to extend EF Core to conditionally modify Select, Insert and Update expressions for certain tables? #30977

Closed

  • Cannot get db transaction in relational database #30914
  • Query: Raw SQL IN subqueries #21020
  • How to disable any conventions related to relationship discovery? #30906
  • EF Core 7.0.6 release date #30974

PullRequests

Created

  • Translate to IN + subquery when possible instead of EXISTS #30976

Updated

  • Disregard parameter names in `ExpressionEqualityComparer.GetHashCode` #30755
    waiting-for-response
  • Translate x.parse #28337
    waiting-for-response
  • Sequence cache support #29716
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Updated
